# The `UnwindLocation` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A class that represents a location for the Call Frame Address (CFA) or a register. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::dwarf::UnwindLocation</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A class that represents a location for the Call Frame Address (CFA) or a register.

This is decoded from the DWARF Call Frame Information instructions and put into an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf/unwindrow">UnwindRow</a>.

Definition at line 36 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h">DWARFDebugFrame.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Enumerations

### enum  {#a6fbbea6b3966c62608feb63d6d203ed5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::dwarf::UnwindLocation::Location ">

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a6fbbea6b3966c62608feb63d6d203ed5add7aa992a49f11aaaf8acb7bde4df002" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Unspecified">
Not specified
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a6fbbea6b3966c62608feb63d6d203ed5a3b7284fc0e118c9df3bd29cd502641c7" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Undefined">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> is not available and can&#39;t be recovered
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a6fbbea6b3966c62608feb63d6d203ed5a8b9b57123446c5515f1b63d437da76cd" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Same">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> value is in the register, nothing needs to be done to unwind it: reg = reg
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a6fbbea6b3966c62608feb63d6d203ed5abc5d851f564326a0f6888ea674722984" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CFAPlusOffset">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> is in or at the CFA plus an offset: reg = CFA + offset reg = defef(CFA + offset)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a6fbbea6b3966c62608feb63d6d203ed5ae4d12158085f5cfd9e7f5d9c8657265b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="RegPlusOffset">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> or CFA is in or at a register plus offset, optionally in an address space: reg = reg + offset &#91;in addrspace&#93; reg = deref(reg + offset &#91;in addrspace&#93;)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a6fbbea6b3966c62608feb63d6d203ed5a68111aa49990ae2352b2ef771df0bae0" />
<EnumerationListItem name="DWARFExpr">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> or CFA value is in or at a value found by evaluating a DWARF expression: reg = eval(dwarf&#95;expr) reg = deref(eval(dwarf&#95;expr))
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a6fbbea6b3966c62608feb63d6d203ed5a5e341c5a2c947be144c341dc933aa083" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Constant">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> is a constant value contained in &quot;Offset&quot;: reg = Offset
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h">DWARFDebugFrame.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### dump() {#a9122a6af9ddf36a3a65346fe19ff520c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void UnwindLocation::dump (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/didumpoptions">DIDumpOptions</a> DumpOpts) const</>}>
Dump a location expression as text and use the register information if some is provided.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="OS">the stream to use for output.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="MRI">register information that helps emit register names insteead of raw register numbers.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="IsEH">true if the DWARF Call Frame Information is from .eh&#95;frame instead of from .debug&#95;frame. This is needed for register number conversion because some register numbers differ between the two sections for certain architectures like x86.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h/#l00167">167</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h">DWARFDebugFrame.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-cpp/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-cpp">DWARFDebugFrame.cpp</a>.

Some opcodes will modify the CFA location&#39;s offset only, so we need to be able to modify the CFA offset when evaluating DWARF Call Frame Information opcodes.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h/#l00146">146</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h">DWARFDebugFrame.h</a>.

### createIsCFAPlusOffset() {#af077ec9d425917adfcb44d3af3bbdd2d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>UnwindLocation UnwindLocation::createIsCFAPlusOffset (int32&#95;t Off)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a location that is in (Deref == false) or at (Deref == true) the CFA plus an offset.

Most registers that are spilled onto the stack use this rule. The rule for the register will use this rule and specify a unique offset from the CFA with <em>Deref</em> set to true. This value will be relative to a CFA value which is typically defined using the register plus offset location. 
<SectionUser title="See Also">
createRegisterPlusOffset(...) <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a4cfc8b177e8521a4b496ae2edff6244f">for</a> more information.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h/#l00108">108</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h">DWARFDebugFrame.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-cpp/#l00052">52</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-cpp">DWARFDebugFrame.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createIsDWARFExpression() {#a67d7ed3b0a73532408da335d20a33751}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>UnwindLocation UnwindLocation::createIsDWARFExpression (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfexpression">DWARFExpression</a> Expr)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a location whose value is the result of evaluating a DWARF expression.

This allows complex expressions to be evaluated in order to unwind a register or CFA value.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h/#l00127">127</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h">DWARFDebugFrame.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-cpp/#l00072">72</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-cpp">DWARFDebugFrame.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createIsRegisterPlusOffset() {#a505c357efe3a5850808b45700527e471}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>UnwindLocation UnwindLocation::createIsRegisterPlusOffset (uint32&#95;t Reg, int32&#95;t Off, std::optional&lt; uint32&#95;t &gt; AddrSpace=std::nullopt)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a location where the saved value is in (Deref == false) or at (Deref == true) a regiser plus an offset and, optionally, in the specified address space (used mostly for the CFA).

The CFA is usually defined using this rule by using the stack pointer or frame pointer as the register, with an offset that accounts for all spilled registers and all local variables in a function, and Deref == false.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h/#l00119">119</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h">DWARFDebugFrame.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-cpp/#l00061">61</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-cpp">DWARFDebugFrame.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a location where the value is undefined and not available.

This can happen when a register is volatile and can&#39;t be recovered.

### createUnspecified() {#a5fa9468956d3c4c0b55c047547d380e0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="UnwindLocation UnwindLocation::createUnspecified ()"
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a location whose rule is set to Unspecified.

This means the register value might be in the same register but it wasn&#39;t specified in the unwind opcodes.
